body:
That's a good point about viewing API views directly (with a browser).

I think your redirect idea is good (`django.contrib.staticfiles.storage.staticfiles_storage.url` should be able to get you the URL for the resource). You'll also want to make sure the redirect view has cache headers for 30 seconds (you should probably add a new setting for this), as we get enough traffic on Normandy that no caching would melt our app servers.

I'm apparently unable to assign the issue to you unless you're a collaborator on the repo, but you should feel free to submit a PR for this issue. Thanks for the help!
